children.label: $gettext("1. Fund withdrawal mechanism is following PNDS mechanism")
children.name: fund_withdrawal_mechanism_is_following_pnds_mechanism

children.label: $gettext("2. Complete transaction in the Bank book (FF 2 and FF 3) and the balance is match with the bank statement balance")
children.name: complete_transaction_in_the_bank_book

children.label: $gettext("3. Complete the Payment Vouchers (FF 7) and signed")
children.name: complete_the_payment_vouchers_and_signed

children.label: $gettext("4. Document/evidence are complete, and the value matches with the Payment Vouchers (FF 7)")
children.name: document_are_complete_and_matches

children.label: $gettext("5. Complete transaction in the Cash book (FF 9 and FF 10) and signed")
children.name: complete_transaction_in_the_cash_book

children.label: $gettext("6. Total Cash in the hands for both Operational and Infrastructure Funds is not more than USD 1,000 (FF 11)")
children.name: total_cash_is_not_more_than_usd_1000

children.label: $gettext("8. All Original finance documents are kept properly in the Village /Suku")
children.name: all_original_finance_docs_are_kept_properly

children.label: $gettext("9. A PNDS Procurement process mechanism is implemented based on the guidelines")
children.name: pnds_procurement_process_mechanism_is_implemented

children.label: $gettext("10. Complete FF16, FF17, FF18, FF19, FF 20 and FF 21 forms and signed")
children.name: complete_some_forms

children.label: $gettext("11. All Original procurement documents are kept properly in the Village/Suku")
children.name: all_original_procurement_documents_are_kept_properly

children.label: $gettext("12. Finance reports (FF 12) are published monthly on the village community notice board")
children.name: finance_reports_are_published_monthly
